inclusion.criterion: screening laboratory values within normal limits or abnormal but not clinically significant
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of psychosis, drug or alcohol abuse history within the last year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: malignancy within the last 2 years (except skin cancer)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: clinically significant conditions (including but not limited to cardiovascular or hepatic diseases), and seizure disorders
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: previous trial of pregabalin, history of intolerance or hypersensitivity to pregabalin
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of acne and mild hirsutism, with elevated testosterone levels. She also has positive history for snoring and headache.
